scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate:undo:all &&  NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate && NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:seed:all &&  jest
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate:undo:all &&  NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate && NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:seed:all && nodemon server.js
